items.sentence: Tom is going to wear the new coat he bought yesterday.
Tom is going to Mary's place to help her do something.
Tom is at the hospital now, waiting to see the doctor.
I'm pretty sure Tom is the one that started the rumor.
I was shocked when I heard that Tom had been arrested.
I did it because I wanted to, not because I needed to.
I don't do that now, but I used to when I was younger.
Tom and Mary told us that they wouldn't fight anymore.
Do you think that Tom knows where Mary studied French?
I think that I wouldn't enjoy playing tennis with Tom.
